Package org.rapidcontext.core.task

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
org.rapidcontext.core.task.Scheduler
public class Scheduler extends Object
A task scheduler for asynchronous tasks and background jobs. This class handles all global background threads and task execution and provides a simple time thread implementation to avoid multiple background threads.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Per Cederberg

  • Constructor Details

      public Scheduler()

  • Method Details

    • schedule

      public static boolean schedule(Task task, long delay, long period)
      Schedules a recurring task. Only a single task with the same task id is allowed, later tasks with the same id will be ignored (if the first one is still scheduled).
      Parameters:
      task - the task to run
      delay - the first execution delay (in millis)
      period - the waiting period (in millis)
      Returns:
      true if the task was scheduled, or false if an identical task was already in the queue

    • unschedule

      public static boolean unschedule(Task task)
      Removes a task from the scheduler queue.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to remove
      Returns:
      true if the task was unscheduled, or false if it had already been removed

    • unscheduleAll

      public static void unscheduleAll()
      Removes all tasks from the scheduler queue.
